articles.description: Follow live text commentary of four Champions League play-off first leg games, with holders Paris Saint-Germain and Real Madrid among teams in action.
articles.title: Champions League LIVE: Build-up, team news, score and live text updates from the Champions League

articles.description: Real Madrid's Champions League knockout phase play-off tie at Benfica is halted for 10 minutes after Vinicius Junior and his team-mates leave the field.
articles.title: Benfica v Real Madrid: Champions League tie halted after Real Madrid players leave field

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Benfica vs Real Madrid in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Benfica vs Real Madrid: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Six Russian and four Belarusian athletes will compete under their nations' flags at the upcoming Winter Paralympics.
articles.title: Winter Paralympics 2026: Six Russians and four Belarusians to compete under national flags

articles.description: Team GB's Winter Olympics curling medal hopes are now in serious jeopardy after Bruce Mouat's world champions were beaten 9-5 by Canada in Cortina.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: GB curlers on brink of early exit after Canada defeat

articles.description: Galatasaray will take a three-goal lead to Turin after coming from behind to beat Juventus in a frenetic first leg of their Champions League knockout play-off.
articles.title: Galatasaray 5-2 Juventus: Turkish champions take charge after second-half fightback

articles.description: Tiger Woods says competing at this year's Masters is "not off the table" but the 15-time major champion still has no timetable for his return.
articles.title: Tiger Woods: 2026 Masters 'not off the table' but no timetable for return

articles.description: England winger Bukayo Saka commits his future to Premier League leaders Arsenal by signing a new five-year deal.
articles.title: Bukayo Saka signs new five-year deal at Arsenal

articles.description: Substitute Desire Doue inspired holders Paris St-Germain to an impressive comeback against 10-man Monaco in the first leg of their Champions League knockout phase play-off tie.
articles.title: Champions League: Substitute Desire Doue inspires PSG comeback at Monaco

articles.description: Henry Pollock is handed his first Test start as Steve Borthwick makes three changes to his starting XV for England's Six Nations match against Ireland on Saturday.
articles.title: England team v Ireland:  Henry Pollock gets first start
